an3.3:4.1: “There are these three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of a fool.
an3.3:4.3: A fool thinks poorly, speaks poorly, and acts poorly.
an3.3:4.4: If a fool didn’t think poorly, speak poorly, and act poorly, then how would the astute know of them:
an3.3:4.5: ‘This fellow is a fool, a bad person’?
an3.3:4.6: But since a fool does think poorly, speak poorly, and act poorly, then the astute do know of them:
an3.3:4.7: ‘This fellow is a fool, a bad person’.
an3.3:4.8: These are the three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of a fool.
an3.3:5.1: There are these three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of an astute person.
an3.3:5.3: An astute person thinks well, speaks well, and acts well.
an3.3:5.4: If an astute person didn’t think well, speak well, and act well, then how would the astute know of them:
an3.3:5.5: ‘This fellow is astute, a good person’?
an3.3:5.6: But since an astute person does think well, speak well, and act well, then the astute do know of them:
an3.3:5.7: ‘This fellow is astute, a good person’.
an3.3:5.8: These are the three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of an astute person.
